channel.title: Offline? while its not?
channel.description:
since a few days i get strange messages of players that the server is offline while its running and no-ip is running too and isee oter pepole play too but i have realized thatafter a amaunt of time players cant log in anymore if they haven't log in like the first10 mins of he server running anyway to fix this?
and: when try to register at moparscape i get 2 messages
server is offline this is because that 10 minutes thingy
and second
to many variable column id? this is a strange one
so i cant register ...
so yeah this is my problem dont post if your going to flame or saying that i shud slove it on my own... source i use allstar v2 thanks for helping

item.title: Offline? while its not?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

so ur server wont turn on for people to play on,? well delete the no-ip u have now and make a new 1

NOTE: dont worry becuz the old no-ip will work, i had to do this… it means ur no-ip has flooded, :o

Read full topic
